title: Personal Website
description: This project serves as an update to my original personal website. To become more proficient in using React.js, I used this framework to create the website you are currently viewing.

title: Global Impact Calculator
description: The e-stewards Global Impact Calculator started as a project for my Inter-Professional Project (IPRO) course. The amount of work to deliver a quality web app carried over into the summer of 2020. Over the summer, the work consisted of researching the yield amount of various e-waste and building a calculator for people to determine the yields of their e-waste. During this process, the team and I met with representatives from e-Stewards. In these biweekly meetings, we discussed various aspects of the calculator and research.

title: Coursera Reviews
description: Project performing sentiment analysis on several Coursera reviews. Coursera is an online course provider and the dataset for the reviews provided through a user on Kaggle.

title: Language
description: Discord Bot used to moderate a Discord server.

title: Stock Watch
description: An Android mobile app made to function as any other stock watch. The app displays all performance data of a selected stock by making a call to a stock API which returns all relevant data.

title: News Gateway
description: An Android mobile app made to display news articles based on genre and the news outlet. Based on the user's filter, the app will display a column-based list of several news articles. From there, a user can pick an article that will then show more relevant information. Upon a further click, the app will send the user to the full article.

title: Know Your Government
description: An Android mobile app made to display Government officials based on their current area. Users can also search other locations to see the different officials. On startup, a column-based list shows the government officials in a hierarchal order. A user can then click on an official to see much more relevant information.

title: Smart Parking
description: A smart parking application made to function like other parking applications. The start of the project involved creating the relational schema to set up the backend. From there, I used the toolkit Swing to create the GUI for the frontend. With Java, I can communicate with the PostgreSQL database for the backend.

title: Online Grocery Store
description: This project depicts an Online Grocery Store. The project began through the process of designing the relational schema. From there, using some wireframing tools, a blueprint of how the frontend should look is made. With Java, the backend is managed by being able to communicate with the PostgreSQL database.
